sys_remote_update_set.description: Lists tables by table name in filter navigator to be searchable. Should only be used in development, personal development and sub-prod instances. Select the listed tables by editing the system property simple_table_nav.tables.
sys_remote_update_set.name: Simple Table Navigation

sys_update_xml.name: sys_properties_e90e98de2f751110dc91c886f699b636
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_properties"><sys_properties action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choices/><description>Tables that should be added to the modules list. Adding alot or all tables will take a long time to process and slow down the navbar load time considerably.</description><ignore_cache>true</ignore_cache><is_private>false</is_private><name>simple_table_nav.tables</name><read_roles/><suffix/><sys_class_name>sys_properties</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-09 17:42:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>e90e98de2f751110dc91c886f699b636</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>simple_table_nav.tables</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Simple Table Navigation" source="090a181e2f751110dc91c886f699b6bf">090a181e2f751110dc91c886f699b6bf</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Simple Table Navigation">090a181e2f751110dc91c886f699b6bf</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_properties_e90e98de2f751110dc91c886f699b636</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-09 19:14:34</sys_updated_on><type>string</type><value>core_company,sys_user,sys_user_group</value><write_roles/></sys_properties><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e90e98de2f751110dc91c886f699b636"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_properties_category_5a41a0162fb51110dc91c886f699b6e6
sys_update_xml.payload: SimpleTableNavigationsys_properties_categoryadmin2022-09-09 17:56:215a41a0162fb51110dc91c886f699b6e65SimpleTableNavigation090a181e2f751110dc91c886f699b6bf090a181e2f751110dc91c886f699b6bfsys_properties_category_5a41a0162fb51110dc91c886f699b6e6admin2022-09-09 19:40:25<![CDATA[<p><strong>Setup the Simple Table Navigation.</strong></p> <p>You can add tables that should be available by the filter navigator.<br /><span style="color: #e67e23;">Adding alot or all tables will take a long time to process and slow down the navbar load time considerably.</span></p> <p>The target_menu property specifies the sys_id of the menu the modules for the tables should be placed in.<br /><span style="color: #e03e2d;">This Property should not be changed, as this could lead to big problems with other menues if the wrong menu sys_id is pasted in.</span></p>]]>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_app_application"><sys_app_application action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><category display_value="Custom Applications">e0355b31ef303000a61d5a3615c0fb78</category><description/><device_type>browser</device_type><hint/><name/><order>100</order><roles>admin</roles><sys_class_name>sys_app_application</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-09 17:26:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7b7a185e2f751110dc91c886f699b6cc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Simple Table Navigation</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Simple Table Navigation" source="090a181e2f751110dc91c886f699b6bf">090a181e2f751110dc91c886f699b6bf</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Simple Table Navigation">090a181e2f751110dc91c886f699b6bf</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_app_application_7b7a185e2f751110dc91c886f699b6cc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-09 17:26:30</sys_updated_on><title>Simple Table Navigation</title><view_name/></sys_app_application></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_e72ad05e2f751110dc91c886f699b688
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.SimpleTableNavigationUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>SimpleTableNavigationUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var SimpleTableNavigationUtils = Class.create();
SimpleTableNavigationUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	addTable: function(table_name, omit_check_exists) {
		if(!omit_check_exists)
			if (this.tableExists(table_name))
				return false;
		
		var new_module = new GlideRecord("sys_app_module");
		new_module.initialize();
		new_module.title = table_name;
		new_module.application = gs.getProperty("simple_table_nav.target_menu");
		new_module.sys_name = table_name;
		new_module.sys_scope = gs.getProperty("global");
		new_module.name = table_name;
		new_module.link_type = "LIST";
		new_module.hint = "jump to table";
		new_module.insert();
	},
	removeTable: function(table_name){
		var target_module = new GlideRecord("sys_app_module");
		target_module.addQuery("application", gs.getProperty("simple_table_nav.target_menu"));
		target_module.addQuery("name", table_name);
		target_module.addQuery("link_type", "LIST");
		target_module.addQuery("hint","jump to table");
		target_module.query();
		if(target_module.getRowCount() === 1){
			target_module.next();
			target_module.deleteRecord();
		}
	},
	tableExists: function(table_name){
		var tableList = gs.getProperty("simple_table_nav.tables").split(",");
		var target_module = new GlideRecord("sys_app_module");
		target_module.addQuery("application", gs.getProperty("simple_table_nav.target_menu"));
		target_module.addQuery("link_type", "LIST");
		target_module.addQuery("hint","jump to table");
		target_module.query();
		return (target_module.getRowCount() === 1);
	},
	reloadTables: function(){
				var tableList = gs.getProperty("simple_table_nav.tables").split(",");
		var target_module = new GlideRecord("sys_app_module");
		target_module.addQuery("application", gs.getProperty("simple_table_nav.target_menu"));
		target_module.addQuery("link_type", "LIST");
		target_module.addQuery("hint","jump to table");
		target_module.query();
		while (target_module.next()){
			if (!tableList.includes(target_module.getValue("name"))){
				target_module.deleteRecord();
			}
		}
		for(var i = 0; i < tableList.length; i++){
			this.addTable(tableList[i], true);
		}
	},
    type: 'SimpleTableNavigationUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-09 17:25:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>e72ad05e2f751110dc91c886f699b688</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SimpleTableNavigationUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Simple Table Navigation" source="090a181e2f751110dc91c886f699b6bf">090a181e2f751110dc91c886f699b6bf</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Simple Table Navigation">090a181e2f751110dc91c886f699b6bf</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e72ad05e2f751110dc91c886f699b688</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-09 18:25:16</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_6f8de0de2fb51110dc91c886f699b684
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_properties</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sys_properties">name=simple_table_nav.tables^valueVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="simple_table_nav.tables"/><item endquery="false" field="value" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Reload Simple Table Navigation</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var stnTools = new SimpleTableNavigationUtils();
	stnTools.reloadTables();
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-09 18:49:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6f8de0de2fb51110dc91c886f699b684</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Reload Simple Table Navigation</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Simple Table Navigation" source="090a181e2f751110dc91c886f699b6bf">090a181e2f751110dc91c886f699b6bf</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Simple Table Navigation">090a181e2f751110dc91c886f699b6bf</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_6f8de0de2fb51110dc91c886f699b684</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-09 18:50:10</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=6f8de0de2fb51110dc91c886f699b684"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_1be8e8da2fb51110dc91c886f699b6a8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_properties</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sys_properties">name=simple_table_nav.tables^valueVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="simple_table_nav.tables"/><item endquery="false" field="value" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Check Simple Table Navigation Table List</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var tableList = current.value.split(",");
	for(var i = 0; i < tableList.length; i++){
		var check = new GlideRecord("sys_db_object");
		check.addQuery("name",tableList[i]);
		check.query();
		if(check.getRowCount() !== 1){
			current.setAbortAction(true);
			gs.addErrorMessage("Table with name '" + tableList[i] + "' could not be found");
			return false;
		}
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-09 18:31:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1be8e8da2fb51110dc91c886f699b6a8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check Simple Table Navigation Table List</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Simple Table Navigation" source="090a181e2f751110dc91c886f699b6bf">090a181e2f751110dc91c886f699b6bf</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Simple Table Navigation">090a181e2f751110dc91c886f699b6bf</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_1be8e8da2fb51110dc91c886f699b6a8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-09 18:49:02</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1be8e8da2fb51110dc91c886f699b6a8"/></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Check Simple Table Navigation Table List
